OnFriend: Hello, I am Trashy Bot #1. You can donate or trade me items, where my items are worth 100% and yours are worth 95%(total min price is $0.30). Use !help if you want some donation commands
Donations: Thank you for donating items to this bot.
Junk_Items: Sorry but your items are worth to little
Admins_Trade: Your trade is getting accepted right now, Admin
Trade_Accept: Your trade has been accepted. Have a nice day! :steamhappy:
Trade_Decline: Your trade has been declined as you have offer to little. Please try again and remember, my items are worth 100% and yours are worth 95%
Unkown_Command: Unkown Command. Use !help for a list of commands!

Help.!help: Use the following commands to make quick case donations; !chroma, !chroma2, !chroma3, !gamma, !gamma2, !shadow, !revolver, !hydra, !falchion, !glove, !spectrum, !spectrum2, !bravo, !vanguard, !huntsman, !winter, !breakout, !weapon, !weapon2, !weapon3 and !takecsgo. Use !credits to view your credit balance.
